Article description (english): Tefal DT9530 Pure Tex Steam Smoother | Exclusive Multi-Pad System | 4 Functions in One Device: Destination, Smoothing, Cleaning, Fragrances | Suitable for All Home Textiles
Features: About this item    4 functions in one steamer: sterilises, smooths, cleans and fragrances all textiles in your home    EXCLUSIVE MULTI-PAD SYSTEM - The smart, interchangeable and reversible pads with microfibre side remove hair, lint and dust from all types of fabric, even when difficult to clean or wash    Completely natural sterilisation: the steam power refreshes, sterilises and kills up to 99.9% of viruses, bacteria and germs    Wrinkle smoothing: leave the house in time and in impeccable clothing - thanks to the unique technology, perfect results are possible on all your textiles    Fragrance diffuser: With the help of MonParfum pad, you can steam your clothes with your favourite fragrance    Fast & Efficient: Ready to use in 15 seconds and perfect wrinkle smoothing in an efficient vertical movement without the need for an ironing board

Article description: Midea NTH20-18MRA Ceramic Fan Heater 2000 W with Thermostat, 70° Oscillation, Electric Heater with 2 Heat Settings, ECO Mode, 8H Timer, Carry Handle, Tilt Protection & Overheating Protection, PTC Heater
Article description (english): Midea NTH20-18MRA Ceramic Fan Heater 2000 W with Thermostat, 70° Oscillation, Electric Heater with 2 Heat Settings, ECO Mode, 8H Timer, Carry Handle, Tilt Protection & Overheating Protection, PTC Heater
Features:
About this item    Fast and quiet heating: equipped with ceramic heating elements and a rated power of up to 2000 watts, our PTC fan heater can quickly provide heat for relatively small rooms. The noise during the operation of the fan heater is only 52 dB and very quiet enough at the low heat setting, so that people can sleep comfortably at night without interference.    【Great helper to warm your corner】With a 70° oscillation to heat from side to side to increase the heat distribution area by 20 percent and efficiently heat yourself or your family without wasting heat. Designed with an integrated handle for easy movement.    【ECO-FRIENDLY MODE】Choose from 3 heating modes: high (2000W), low (1200W) and ECO. In ECO mode, the room heater automatically adjusts the heater fan between 2000 W and 1200 W, depending on the temperature difference between the room and the heating temperature you set to save energy and keep the room comfortable.    Multiple safety: Built with tipping protection and overheating protection, the heater automatically switches off when tipped over and over temperature to avoid damage to furniture or carpets.    Easy control for comfort: thanks to the 8-hour timer with automatic shut-off and remote control, you can easily control the heater without having to get up from the bed or sofa. LED display and touch control are also optional for your easy operation.

Article description: Klarstein Summer Vibe Floor Fan 16 Inch Rotor (41 cm) with 5 Blades 55 W 3 Wind Speeds Air Flow 2040 m³/h Oscillation 65° Rotor Head 30° Black
Article description (english): Klarstein Summer Vibe Floor Fan 16 Inch Rotor (41 cm) with 5 Blades 55 W 3 Wind Speeds Air Flow 2040 m³/h Oscillation 65° Rotor Head 30° Black
Features:
About this item    Fresh wind on hot days: feel the summer: with the Klarstein Summer Vibe stand fan, fresh wind comes on hot days - ideal for cooling overheated moods to pleasant operating temperatures.    Simple, powerful, refreshing: this is the work and design principle of the stand fan. With its 5-blade, 16 inch (41 cm) rotor it moves up to 2040 m³/h air per hour - well dosed in 3 speed settings from light breeze to cooling wind.    Energy-saving: the Summer Vibe supports the body's own temperature regulation in an energy-saving way and gives us a cooling effect without cooling the air.    Performance: rotor remains comparatively quiet and is also suitable for use in noise-sensitive environments such as office rooms and bedrooms. With only 55 W power consumption in continuous operation, the floor fan is the economical and environmentally friendly way to summer freshness.    Design: Thanks to its slim design, the Klarstein Summer Vibe pedestal fan fits into almost any room to create a cooling airflow. It is always tilt-proof on its five feet.

Energy-saving DC motor: Unlike the traditional AC motor fan, the Midea floor fan is equipped with DC motor and therefore it is environmentally friendly and energy-saving. Even at the maximum speed, the FS40-16CR floor fan works with only 25 watts.    5 m remote control and oscillation: the Midea floor fan is equipped with a multifunctional remote control. This makes it easy to control comfortably from your sofa or bed. Due to oscillation, the airflow can cover a large area of space.    4 wind modes and 12 levels: with 4 modes, the Midea floor fan realises the necessary confusion of the air flow. In normal wind mode, the wind speed can be set with a value between 01 and 12. In natural wind mode and sleep mode between 01 and 03. In silent mode, the Midea floor fan runs at an inaudible speed.    【12H Timer & Adjustable Height】With 30 minute steps, you can program the timer up to 12 hours and then the fan switches off automatically. In addition, the adjustable height and the adjustable tilt angle take care of the distribution of air flow in rooms.

Article description: Midea NTH20-18MRA Ceramic Fan Heater 2000 W with Thermostat, 70° Oscillation, Electric Heater with 2 Heat Settings, ECO Mode, 8H Timer, Carry Handle, Tilt Protection & Overheating Protection, PTC Heater
Article description (english): Midea NTH20-18MRA Ceramic Fan Heater 2000 W with Thermostat, 70° Oscillation, Electric Heater with 2 Heat Settings, ECO Mode, 8H Timer, Carry Handle, Tilt Protection & Overheating Protection, PTC Heater
Features:
About this item    Fast and quiet heating: equipped with ceramic heating elements and a rated power of up to 2000 watts, our PTC fan heater can quickly provide heat for relatively small rooms. The noise during the operation of the fan heater is only 52 dB and very quiet enough at the low heat setting, so that people can sleep comfortably at night without interference.    【Great helper to warm your corner】With a 70° oscillation to heat from side to side to increase the heat distribution area by 20 percent and efficiently heat yourself or your family without wasting heat. Designed with an integrated handle for easy movement.    【ECO-FRIENDLY MODE】Choose from 3 heating modes: high (2000W), low (1200W) and ECO. In ECO mode, the room heater automatically adjusts the heater fan between 2000 W and 1200 W, depending on the temperature difference between the room and the heating temperature you set to save energy and keep the room comfortable.    Multiple safety: Built with tipping protection and overheating protection, the heater automatically switches off when tipped over and over temperature to avoid damage to furniture or carpets.    Easy control for comfort: thanks to the 8-hour timer with automatic shut-off and remote control, you can easily control the heater without having to get up from the bed or sofa. LED display and touch control are also optional for your easy operation.

Article description (english): TEFAL IXEO Power All-in-One QT2020 Steam Smoother with Integrated 3-Position Smart Board Disinfect and Ironing High Pressure Steam Technology 5.8 Bar Steam Pressure 2170 W
Features: About this item    All-in-one solution with integrated 3-position smart board for a perfect steam ironing experience without an ironing board    High pressure steam technology for excellent wrinkle smoothing: 2170 W, up to 5.8 bar steam pressure, continuous steam release of up to 90 g/min. and steam boost of up to 200 g/min.    Sanitizing: Eliminates up to 99.99% of viruses, bacteria and germs on home textiles and clothes* Sofas, mattresses, pillows, coats, cuddly toys etc. can be disinfected by the natural power of steam    Extra light practical handpiece: half the weight of a conventional steam iron, for effortless and versatile ironing/steaming smoothing, includes precision ironing tip for hard-to-reach areas    Smart Protect technology: suitable for all types of fabric, even the most sensitive, no adjustment required, no risk of burns    Removable base that allows you to move freely with your steamer and thus allows you to reach all home textiles comfortably    External test on cotton textiles, with thorough ironing application    Press the "steam" button one by one until you reach the desired mode. Normal mode: the green light is off. Max mode: the green light flashes. Min mode: the green light is constantly on. By pressing the steam trigger three times, some sets of ultra boost steam can be released for garments that require special attention to remove the wrinkles

Article description: TEFAL IXEO Power All-in-One QT2020 Steam Smoother with Integrated 3-Position Smart Board Disinfect and Ironing High Pressure Steam Technology 5.8 Bar Steam Pressure 2170 W
Article description (english): TEFAL IXEO Power All-in-One QT2020 Steam Smoother with Integrated 3-Position Smart Board Disinfect and Ironing High Pressure Steam Technology 5.8 Bar Steam Pressure 2170 W
Features: About this item    All-in-one solution with integrated 3-position smart board for a perfect steam ironing experience without an ironing board    High pressure steam technology for excellent wrinkle smoothing: 2170 W, up to 5.8 bar steam pressure, continuous steam release of up to 90 g/min. and steam boost of up to 200 g/min.    Sanitizing: Eliminates up to 99.99% of viruses, bacteria and germs on home textiles and clothes* Sofas, mattresses, pillows, coats, cuddly toys etc. can be disinfected by the natural power of steam    Extra light practical handpiece: half the weight of a conventional steam iron, for effortless and versatile ironing/steaming smoothing, includes precision ironing tip for hard-to-reach areas    Smart Protect technology: suitable for all types of fabric, even the most sensitive, no adjustment required, no risk of burns    Removable base that allows you to move freely with your steamer and thus allows you to reach all home textiles comfortably    External test on cotton textiles, with thorough ironing application    Press the "steam" button one by one until you reach the desired mode. Normal mode: the green light is off. Max mode: the green light flashes. Min mode: the green light is constantly on. By pressing the steam trigger three times, some sets of ultra boost steam can be released for garments that require special attention to remove the wrinkles

Article description: Klarstein Summer Vibe Floor Fan 16 Inch Rotor (41 cm) with 5 Blades 55 W 3 Wind Speeds Air Flow 2040 m³/h Oscillation 65° Rotor Head 30° Black
Article description (english): Klarstein Summer Vibe Floor Fan 16 Inch Rotor (41 cm) with 5 Blades 55 W 3 Wind Speeds Air Flow 2040 m³/h Oscillation 65° Rotor Head 30° Black
Features:
About this item    Fresh wind on hot days: feel the summer: with the Klarstein Summer Vibe stand fan, fresh wind comes on hot days - ideal for cooling overheated moods to pleasant operating temperatures.    Simple, powerful, refreshing: this is the work and design principle of the stand fan. With its 5-blade, 16 inch (41 cm) rotor it moves up to 2040 m³/h air per hour - well dosed in 3 speed settings from light breeze to cooling wind.    Energy-saving: the Summer Vibe supports the body's own temperature regulation in an energy-saving way and gives us a cooling effect without cooling the air.    Performance: rotor remains comparatively quiet and is also suitable for use in noise-sensitive environments such as office rooms and bedrooms. With only 55 W power consumption in continuous operation, the floor fan is the economical and environmentally friendly way to summer freshness.    Design: Thanks to its slim design, the Klarstein Summer Vibe pedestal fan fits into almost any room to create a cooling airflow. It is always tilt-proof on its five feet.

Article description: Klarstein Hightower Heat Deluxe Ceramic Column Heater with Thermostat Stand Fan 2 in 1 2200W Heater Blower 5 to 35°C Shut-off Timer with Remote Control Black and White
Article description (english): Klarstein Hightower Heat Deluxe Ceramic Column Heater with Thermostat Stand Fan 2 in 1 2200W Heater Blower 5 to 35°C Shut-off Timer with Remote Control Black and White
Features: About this item    Space-saving: the high-tower heat deluxe fan heater from Klarstein combines the advantages of pleasant and fast heat on cool days with a refreshing airflow when it gets hot in summer.    2-in-1 function: 2-in-1 is the credo of the Klarstein heater, which understands itself as a fan heater and fan in one and thus performs its service all year round. It heats the air in a flash, the heat is noticeable after just a few moments.    Powerful: in three heat settings with up to 2,200 watts of power, it warms rooms up to 20 m². A switchable oscillation function distributes the warm air in the room and accelerates the heating process.    Smart: the desired target heat can be selected between 5 and 35 °C. Once it is reached, the fan heater switches off independently, but immediately resumes operation when the temperature drops below the desired value.    Comfortable: a 24-hour timer is programmed in hour increments and switches the device on or off after expiration. All functions are controlled via a clear touch panel or conveniently via remote control.

Features:
About this item    Air quality sensors with colour-coded display monitor the particle content in the air and show the air quality in real time.    Automatic smart mode activates filtration and its intensity due to continuous sensor measurements.    The triple filtration system removes up to 99.9% ultra-fine particles, including those invisible to the eye. Washable patented ECO permanent filters (^3) allow economical operation as filters do not need to be purchased again. Effectively cleans the air at a CADR of 315 m3/h, for rooms up to 129 m2.

Das Gerät piept. Das Licht blinkt kontinuierlich. Zum Wiedereinschalten heben nach oben kippen, nach vorne neigen und dann aufrecht hinstellen, um die Betriebstemperatur wieder zu erreichen. Bei der automatischen Abschaltung gehen keine Einstellungen verloren

Self-cleaning function Please note: If the iron does not stand, it switches itself off after approx. 30 seconds with the soleplate lowered or approx. 8 minutes with the ironing in an upright position. The device beeps. The light flashes continuously. To switch it on again, lift it up, tilt it forwards and then stand upright in order to reach the operating temperature again. No settings are lost with automatic shutdown

Features:
About this item    Special PTC ceramic fan heater: with PTC ceramic heating technology, the heater fan can quickly heat an area at home or in the office. The heater can be used horizontally so you can lie on the mat and enjoy the heat of the heater.    【Energy saving & two seasons use】Choose from 4 modes: high (2000W), low (1200W), eco and fan mode. In ECO mode, the heater adjusts the heating mode to the ambient temperature. This can save energy costs and keep you cosy in winter. You can also enjoy the cool in summer with fan mode.    Multiple protection: Built-in heat protection sensor and 24-hour timer ensure a much safer heating. The heater is designed for safe use and quiet enough. The noise is less than 55 dB, so most people can use it in the bedroom.    Wide angle oscillation: with vibrations, this room heater increases the heat distribution area by 20% for even heat, so you get quick and comfortable heating.    Compact and portable: the thermostat heater is only 55 cm high, so you can place it anywhere in your room or office. Hidden handle for easy movement. Adjust the strength and vibration away from your bed or sofa. LED display and touch switch push buttons are also optional for your easy operation.

About this item    Fast and quiet heating: equipped with ceramic heating elements and a rated power of up to 2000 watts, our PTC fan heater can quickly provide heat for relatively small rooms. Article description: De'Longhi Tasciugo Ariadry DD230P Dehumidifier - Electric and Mobile Dehumidifier with Pump System for Rooms up to 150 m³ with Large LCD Display, Environmentally Friendly, Grey
Article description (english): De'Longhi Tasciugo Ariadry DD230P Dehumidifier - Electric and Mobile Dehumidifier with Pump System for Rooms up to 150 m³ with Large LCD Display, Environmentally Friendly, Grey
Features:
About this item    High functionality thanks to patented high-performance pump system: the dehumidifier removes moisture from the air and collects condensation either in the water tank or dissipates it via the supplied drainage hose and even allows pumping up to 5 m difference in height, e.g. from the cellar window to the outside    Quiet, compact and efficient: the collected water can be continuously discharged via a separate drain hose, so that continuous operation is possible, which is automatically interrupted when the water tank is full, thanks to the tank control system, the functions and settings are easy to program and control    For optimal indoor climate: too high humidity often leads to health damage, mould or moisture formation and can become a problem especially in laundry rooms or dry rooms, but with the room dehumidifier too high humidity with 2 ventilation levels in each room can be reduced    Pioneer in environmental protection: De'Longhi only uses the refrigerant R290 for all dehumidifiers, which as a natural, non-toxic gas does not damage the ozone layer or has a significant direct influence on the greenhouse effect. Greenhouse potential (GWP) 3 kg CO2 AQ    Box contents: 1 x Dehumidifier DD230P in grey including sewage hose, large LCD display, pre-assembled transport wheels and integrated carry handles from De'Longhi

About this item    High functionality for the perfect room climate: the dehumidifier extracts the air up to 25 litres of moisture in 24 hours and at the same time ensures that the condensation is collected either in the water tank with a capacity of 5.0 l or dissipated via the supplied drainage hose, which allows continuous operation    QUIET, COMPACT & EFFICIENT - With its double filter system, the dehumidifier always keeps air quality optimally balanced, the bio-silver filter reduces bacteria and the anti-dust filter picks up dust from the air so you can breathe in any room - once the water tank is full, the operation is automatically interrupted    For optimal feel-good climate: too high humidity usually leads to health problems or mould and moisture, but with the room dehumidifier and the integrated laundry function, laundry dries even faster and you always have an ideally balanced humidity in your home    Pioneer in environmental protection: De'Longhi only uses the refrigerant R290 for all dehumidifiers, which as a natural, non-toxic gas does not damage the ozone layer or has a significant direct influence on the greenhouse effect. *Greenhouse potential (GWP) 3 kg CO2 AQ    Box contents: 1 x DDSX225 dehumidifier in grey including wastewater hose, double filter system, pre-assembled transport wheels and integrated carry handles from De'Longhi

Features: About this item    Keramik-Bügelsohle mit Dampflöchern und einer 50 % besseren Gleitfähigkeit (im Vergleich zum Russell Hobbs Dampfbügeleisen Powersteam Pro 19330-56 mit 2.750 Watt)    Einkerbungen am Rand der Bügelsohlenspitze für ein leichteres Bügeln der Knopfleiste    3-fache, automatische Sicherheitsabschaltung    Variabler Dampf von bis zu 45 g/min    Extra-Dampfstoß von 210 g/min    Vertikaldampf & Integrierte Anti-Kalk-Kassette. Selbstreinigungsfunktion    Bitte beachten : Steht das Bügeleisen nicht, schaltet es sich nach ca. 30 Sekunden bei abgesenkter Bügelsohle oder ca. 8 Minuten bei aufrechter Bügelstellung aus. Das Gerät piept. Das Licht blinkt kontinuierlich. Zum Wiedereinschalten heben nach oben kippen, nach vorne neigen und dann aufrecht hinstellen, um die Betriebstemperatur wieder zu erreichen. Bei der automatischen Abschaltung gehen keine Einstellungen verloren
Features (english): About this item Ceramic soleplate with steam holes and 50% better gliding ability (compared to the Russell Hobbs steam iron Powersteam Pro 19330-56 with 2,750 watts) Notches on the edge of the soleplate tip for easier ironing of the button placket 3-fold, automatic safety shutdown Variable steam from Up to 45 g / min extra steam boost of 210 g / min vertical steam & integrated anti-limescale cassette. Self-cleaning function Please note: If the iron does not stand, it switches itself off after approx. 30 seconds with the soleplate lowered or approx. 8 minutes with the ironing in an upright position. The device beeps. The light flashes continuously. To switch it on again, lift it up, tilt it forwards and then stand upright in order to reach the operating temperature again. No settings are lost with automatic shutdown

Article description: Nwouiiay Car Air Pump - 12V Electric Digital Compressor - 150 psi - 25 l/min - with Digital Screen, LED, USB Cable - for SUVs, Motorcycles and Bicycles
Article description (english): Nwouiiay Car Air Pump - 12V Electric Digital Compressor - 150 psi - 25 l/min - with Digital Screen, LED, USB Cable - for SUVs, Motorcycles and Bicycles
Features: Small size and large capacity - The integrated lithium battery gives you great power to inflate the tyres of your car, SUV, basketballs and bicycle, any time and anywhere.    Air pressure detection and preset function - The bicycle pump is equipped with an air pressure detector. When connecting the pump to inflatable objects, the pressure of the objects will be automatically displayed on the display; simply adjust the air pressure value by pressing the +/- button before inflating. When the preset value is reached, the pump automatically stops inflating.    Digital pressure gauge with LCD screen - The portable compressor allows you to accurately measure the pressure of your tyres. The P1S provides you with 3 different pressure units (psi, bar, kg/cm²), with which you can select and adjust the desired tyre pressure. When the pressure reaches the preset value, the compressor automatically shuts off to avoid excessive pressure.    Wireless and portable - The wireless design of this compressor and the compact, miniature size make it portable and easy to use by hand. It only takes 4 steps to start inflating. The LCD screen displays the real-time pressure on the side, so you can monitor the pressure without bending down to ground level.    Rechargeable air compressor with LED emergency light - Integrated 5V/1A USB output for charging mobile phones or digital devices - portable and easy to use - rubber pump with highlight LED light design for emergency inflation.

Article description: KLARSTEIN ShirtButler Deluxe Automatic Dry and Ironing Device
Article description (english): KLARSTEIN ShirtButler Deluxe Automatic Dry and Ironing Device
Features: KNITTERFREI TROCKEN IN WENIGEN MINUTEN: Das automatische Trocken- und Bügelsystem treibt Kleidungsstücken die Falten aus. Aus der Waschmaschine direkt auf den Trockner und in wenigen Minuten tragfertig getrocknet und gebügelt – die langersehnteLösung für alle Haushalte.    LEISTUNG: Das 2-in-1-System ermöglicht nicht nur zeitsparend zu trocknen, sondern auch zuverlässig zu bügeln. Die Kleidungsstücke werden nach dem Waschgang einfach über einen Ballonkörper gezogen, der durch eine 1200 W starkes Heizelement mit Thermal Safety System durchgängig mit warmer Luft befüllt wird.    EASY-DRY: Dank wählbarer Temperatur, Easy-Dry Technologie und dem luftdurchlässigen Oxford-Nylon Material entweicht sämtliche Feuchtigkeit aus Hemden, Blusen und T-Shirts bereits nach wenigen Minuten. Die fünf Temperaturstufen von 30 bis 70 °C ermöglichen dabei auf das Bekleidungsmaterial optimal einzugehen.    LED-DISPLAY: Der 6-stufige Timer sorgt für die richtige Trocknungszeit, sodass sowohl leichte als auch schwere Kleidungsstücke zuverlässig trocken sind. Ein LED-Display zeigt dabei jederzeit die getroffenen Einstellungen.    FLEXIBEL: In seiner Grundversion ist das Klarstein Shirtbutler Pro 2-in-1-Trocknersystem zum Trocknen und knitterfreien Bügeln von Hosen ausgerüstet. Dank flexibel Trocknungsaufsatz und optional erhältlichen Aufsätzen, lässt er sich aber auch spielend einfach zum Trocknen von Oberbekleidung oder Schuhen einsetzen.
Features (english): CLEVER-FREE DRYING IN A FEW MINUTES: The automatic drying and ironing system removes creases from garments. From the washing machine straight to the dryer and ready to wear in a few minutes, dried and ironed - the long-awaited solution for all households. PERFORMANCE: The 2-in-1 system not only saves time in drying, it also allows you to iron reliably. After the wash cycle, the garments are simply pulled over a balloon body, which is continuously filled with warm air by a 1200 W heating element with thermal safety system. EASY-DRY: Thanks to the selectable temperature, Easy-Dry technology and the breathable Oxford nylon material, all moisture escapes from shirts, blouses and T-shirts after just a few minutes. The five temperature levels from 30 to 70 ° C enable the clothing material to be optimally addressed. LED DISPLAY: The 6-stage timer ensures the correct drying time so that both light and heavy items of clothing are reliably dry. An LED display shows the settings made at any time. FLEXIBLE: In its basic version, the Klarstein Shirtbutler Pro 2-in-1 dryer system is equipped for drying and crease-free ironing of trousers. Thanks to the flexible drying attachment and optionally available attachments, it can also be used very easily for drying outerwear or shoes.

Article description: KLARSTEIN ShirtButler Deluxe Automatic Dry and Ironing Device
Article description (english): KLARSTEIN ShirtButler Deluxe Automatic Dry and Ironing Device
Features: KNITTERFREI TROCKEN IN WENIGEN MINUTEN: Das automatische Trocken- und Bügelsystem treibt Kleidungsstücken die Falten aus. Aus der Waschmaschine direkt auf den Trockner und in wenigen Minuten tragfertig getrocknet und gebügelt – die langersehnteLösung für alle Haushalte.    LEISTUNG: Das 2-in-1-System ermöglicht nicht nur zeitsparend zu trocknen, sondern auch zuverlässig zu bügeln. Die Kleidungsstücke werden nach dem Waschgang einfach über einen Ballonkörper gezogen, der durch eine 1200 W starkes Heizelement mit Thermal Safety System durchgängig mit warmer Luft befüllt wird.    EASY-DRY: Dank wählbarer Temperatur, Easy-Dry Technologie und dem luftdurchlässigen Oxford-Nylon Material entweicht sämtliche Feuchtigkeit aus Hemden, Blusen und T-Shirts bereits nach wenigen Minuten. Die fünf Temperaturstufen von 30 bis 70 °C ermöglichen dabei auf das Bekleidungsmaterial optimal einzugehen.    LED-DISPLAY: Der 6-stufige Timer sorgt für die richtige Trocknungszeit, sodass sowohl leichte als auch schwere Kleidungsstücke zuverlässig trocken sind. Dank flexibel Trocknungsaufsatz und optional erhältlichen Aufsätzen, lässt er sich aber auch spielend einfach zum Trocknen von Oberbekleidung oder Schuhen einsetzen.

Article description (english): TEFAL IXEO Power All-in-One QT2020 Steam Smoother with Integrated 3-Position Smart Board Disinfect and Ironing High Pressure Steam Technology 5.8 Bar Steam Pressure 2170 W

Article description: Elechomes 5L Top Fill Cool Mist Humidifier & Aroma Diffuser, Room Humidifier, Humidifier for Bedroom, Baby Room, Ultra Quiet, Auto Shut-Off, Timer, ES5001
Article description (english): Elechomes 5L Top Fill Cool Mist Humidifier & Aroma Diffuser, Room Humidifier, Humidifier for Bedroom, Baby Room, Ultra Quiet, Auto Shut-Off, Timer, ES5001
Features:
About this item    2-in-1 humidifier and aroma diffuser: Unlike other humidifiers, the Elechomes ES5001 humidifier increases the humidity in your home and refreshes your air. A corrosion protection water tank has been specially developed for essential oils and allows the direct addition of essential oils to the water.    Top fill design: Elechomes Top-Fill humidifier is incredibly convenient to refill and clean than conventional humidifiers. You can even add water without removing the lid. The large opening is easily accessible and thoroughly cleans the inside of the tank. Please note: Please do not pour water or oil into the fog pipe.    Long-lasting mist release: The extra large 5 litre water tank ensures a continuous working time of up to 60 hours. This is ideal for bedroom, baby room, office and more. The mist can be easily adjusted from 80 ml/h to 300 ml/h with the control button.    Easy control and restful night sleep: One button for easy control, no annoying working noise, extremely quiet at 25 decibels, long press the timer button for 3 minutes to turn off the light, never disturb sleep. It is a good choice for light sleeping person or children.    12-hour timer and auto shut-off: Built-in advanced water level sensor, automatic shut-off in case of lack of water to avoid damage to the humidifier and ensure your safety. Simply set the timer so that no more energy is wasted.    
 See more product details
